messages.name: Aditya Sharma
messages.message: We're looking to renovate our living room and kitchen space. Would love to schedule a consultation to discuss our options. Available on weekends.

messages.name: Priya Mehta
messages.message: I'm interested in your commercial design services for my new office space in Bandra. Please share some examples of your previous work in this area.

messages.name: Rajesh Kumar
messages.message: We recently purchased a 3BHK apartment in South Mumbai and are looking for interior design services. Our budget is around 20 lakhs. Can you help?

messages.name: Sneha Reddy
messages.message: Could you provide a quote for a complete home interior design package? We are moving into a new villa next month.

messages.name: Arjun Singh
messages.message: I need assistance with furniture selection and space optimization for my small studio apartment. Do you offer consultations for small projects?

metadata.description: Contact form submissions for Sharma Space
